text: Helianthus navarri is a species of sunflower in the daisy family. It is native to Chile in South America.Reiche, Karl Friedrich 1905. Anales de la Universidad de Chile, Santiago, 112: 145, Flora de Chile, 4: 94.Philippi, Rudolph Amandus 1895. Anales de la Universidad de Chile 90: 37. ==References== navarri Category:Flora of Chile Category:Plants described in 1895
title: Helianthus navarri
